[Ageless Grace Brain and Body Class
----------------------------------

02
Feb
2026

Ageless Grace is a Brain Health Program based on consciously choosing to change the brain through physical movements similar to playful childhood activities that fire up neurons and develop neural pathways.

3 more dates

Tagged as:¬†,¬†Athletic Club Members](https://parks.addisontx.gov/Winter-2026/Seniors/Ageless-Grace-Brain-and-Body-Class)

03
Feb
2026

[Senior Technology Hour
----------------------

03
Feb
2026

Join us for Senior Technology Hour, a time dedicated to helping seniors become more comfortable with technology. Whether you have questions about smartphones, tables, computers, or other devices, this is a great opportunity to learn and get hands-on help.

Tagged as:¬†,¬†Athletic Club Members](https://parks.addisontx.gov/Winter-2026/Seniors/Senior-Technology-Hour)

[CanceledToddler Spring Dance
----------------------------

03
Feb
2026

Introduce your little one to the joy of movement with this class! This fun and engaging program helps develop coordination, rhythm, and confidence while learning basic dance steps in a supportive environment. The class blends ballet and tap techniques to spark creativity and foster a love for dance.

12 more dates

Tagged as:¬†,¬†Athletic Club Members](https://parks.addisontx.gov/Winter-2026/Kidscene/Toddler-Spring-Dance)

2026

Feb
2026

Whether you're a seasoned dancer or a first-timer, this class offers a journey to the elegance and passion of tango! Learn fundamental steps, techniques, and expressions of the dance. Register solo or with a partner, there will be exercises for both focusing on connection, posture, footwork, and musicality. Pre-register for classes a la carte, or all together.

6 more dates

Tagged as:¬†,¬†Athletic Club Members](https://parks.addisontx.gov/Winter-2026/Adults/Argentine-Tango)
